<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Translate a masked load intrinsic like</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;16 x i32 &gt; @llvm.masked.load( &lt;16 x i32&gt;&#42; %addr, i32 align,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                               &lt;16 x i1&gt; %mask, &lt;16 x i32&gt; %passthru)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to a chain of basic blocks, with loading element one-by-one if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the appropriate mask bit is set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %1 = bitcast i8&#42; %addr to i32&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %2 = extractelement &lt;16 x i1&gt; %mask, i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  br i1 %2, label %cond.load, label %else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cond.load:                                        ; preds = %0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %3 = getelementptr i32&#42; %1, i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %4 = load i32&#42; %3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %5 = insertelement &lt;16 x i32&gt; %passthru, i32 %4, i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  br label %else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// else:                                             ; preds = %0, %cond.load</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %res.phi.else = phi &lt;16 x i32&gt; &#91; %5, %cond.load &#93;, &#91; poison, %0 &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %6 = extractelement &lt;16 x i1&gt; %mask, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  br i1 %6, label %cond.load1, label %else2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cond.load1:                                       ; preds = %else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %7 = getelementptr i32&#42; %1, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %8 = load i32&#42; %7</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %9 = insertelement &lt;16 x i32&gt; %res.phi.else, i32 %8, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  br label %else2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// else2:                                          ; preds = %else, %cond.load1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %res.phi.else3 = phi &lt;16 x i32&gt; &#91; %9, %cond.load1 &#93;, &#91; %res.phi.else, %else &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %10 = extractelement &lt;16 x i1&gt; %mask, i32 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  br i1 %10, label %cond.load4, label %else5</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145" lineLink="#af5f0cd789df078f7bab4037b7d2c988d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#af5f0cd789df078f7bab4037b7d2c988d">scalarizeMaskedLoad</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasBranchDivergence,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;CI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42;DTU,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Translate a masked store intrinsic, like</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// void @llvm.masked.store(&lt;16 x i32&gt; %src, &lt;16 x i32&gt;&#42; %addr, i32 align,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                               &lt;16 x i1&gt; %mask)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to a chain of basic blocks, that stores element one-by-one if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the appropriate mask bit is set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %1 = bitcast i8&#42; %addr to i32&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %2 = extractelement &lt;16 x i1&gt; %mask, i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br i1 %2, label %cond.store, label %else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cond.store:                                       ; preds = %0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %3 = extractelement &lt;16 x i32&gt; %val, i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %4 = getelementptr i32&#42; %1, i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   store i32 %3, i32&#42; %4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br label %else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// else:                                             ; preds = %0, %cond.store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %5 = extractelement &lt;16 x i1&gt; %mask, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br i1 %5, label %cond.store1, label %else2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cond.store1:                                      ; preds = %else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %6 = extractelement &lt;16 x i32&gt; %val, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %7 = getelementptr i32&#42; %1, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   store i32 %6, i32&#42; %7</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br label %else2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   . . .</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318" lineLink="#a7e1f78e5d63e607ceba3b4f22ae02df8"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a7e1f78e5d63e607ceba3b4f22ae02df8">scalarizeMaskedStore</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasBranchDivergence,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;CI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42;DTU,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ModifiedDT) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Translate a masked gather intrinsic like</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;16 x i32 &gt; @llvm.masked.gather.v16i32( &lt;16 x i32&#42;&gt; %Ptrs, i32 4,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                               &lt;16 x i1&gt; %Mask, &lt;16 x i32&gt; %Src)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to a chain of basic blocks, with loading element one-by-one if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the appropriate mask bit is set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Ptrs = getelementptr i32, i32&#42; %base, &lt;16 x i64&gt; %ind</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Mask0 = extractelement &lt;16 x i1&gt; %Mask, i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// br i1 %Mask0, label %cond.load, label %else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cond.load:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Ptr0 = extractelement &lt;16 x i32&#42;&gt; %Ptrs, i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Load0 = load i32, i32&#42; %Ptr0, align 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Res0 = insertelement &lt;16 x i32&gt; poison, i32 %Load0, i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// br label %else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// else:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %res.phi.else = phi &lt;16 x i32&gt;&#91;%Res0, %cond.load&#93;, &#91;poison, %0&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Mask1 = extractelement &lt;16 x i1&gt; %Mask, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// br i1 %Mask1, label %cond.load1, label %else2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cond.load1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Ptr1 = extractelement &lt;16 x i32&#42;&gt; %Ptrs, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Load1 = load i32, i32&#42; %Ptr1, align 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Res1 = insertelement &lt;16 x i32&gt; %res.phi.else, i32 %Load1, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// br label %else2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// . . .</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Result = select &lt;16 x i1&gt; %Mask, &lt;16 x i32&gt; %res.phi.select, &lt;16 x i32&gt; %Src</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ret &lt;16 x i32&gt; %Result</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471" lineLink="#aa026b3b9ac87614295cbdcd804c5aff1"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aa026b3b9ac87614295cbdcd804c5aff1">scalarizeMaskedGather</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasBranchDivergence, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;CI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42;DTU, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ModifiedDT) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Translate a masked scatter intrinsic, like</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// void @llvm.masked.scatter.v16i32(&lt;16 x i32&gt; %Src, &lt;16 x i32&#42;&gt;&#42; %Ptrs, i32 4,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                  &lt;16 x i1&gt; %Mask)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to a chain of basic blocks, that stores element one-by-one if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the appropriate mask bit is set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Ptrs = getelementptr i32, i32&#42; %ptr, &lt;16 x i64&gt; %ind</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Mask0 = extractelement &lt;16 x i1&gt; %Mask, i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// br i1 %Mask0, label %cond.store, label %else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cond.store:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Elt0 = extractelement &lt;16 x i32&gt; %Src, i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Ptr0 = extractelement &lt;16 x i32&#42;&gt; %Ptrs, i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// store i32 %Elt0, i32&#42; %Ptr0, align 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// br label %else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// else:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Mask1 = extractelement &lt;16 x i1&gt; %Mask, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// br i1 %Mask1, label %cond.store1, label %else2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cond.store1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Elt1 = extractelement &lt;16 x i32&gt; %Src, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %Ptr1 = extractelement &lt;16 x i32&#42;&gt; %Ptrs, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// store i32 %Elt1, i32&#42; %Ptr1, align 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// br label %else2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   . . .</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606" lineLink="#a50bc726219ab43b02215f9236e621f76"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a50bc726219ab43b02215f9236e621f76">scalarizeMaskedScatter</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasBranchDivergence, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;CI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42;DTU, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ModifiedDT) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Src = CI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase/#aabd76e6a8a23a5af1ce4d3c310d88bcd">getArgOperand</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shorten the way if the mask is a vector of constants.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the mask is not v1i1, use scalar bit test operations. This generates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// better results on X86 at least. However, don&#39;t do this on GPUs or other</span></CodeLine>
